Name: Ami M
Title: #1 in Rajasthan
Review: After a thorough examination of seven agents and guides in New Delhi, I chose to travel in Rajasthan with Kumar Taxi and it turned out to be a good choice. Their availability at WhatsApp and by email was very good. Their prices are fair and comfortable. But the thing that really made my trip outstanding is the driver Darbara Singh. Darbara is an excellent driver, a person who is open to any request, a pleasant person and well acquainted with all the sites. Only with him you can see "Extra Monuments". What these sites are, I can't tell you. You will only find this out if you choose to travel with Darbara Singh.

Title: Great Experience
Review: Kumar tour & travel is the best in their services. Highly recommended for the official & family tours as well. We had a tour from kumar tour & travel for Jaipur, it was a great experience to choose their services.

Name: Neiloy G
Title: Good Service
Review: I found Kumar's service online. And the process was smooth and efficient throughout. He was prompt in responding to my messages. We negotiated and closed off the price without any hassle. The pick up was on time and the ride was extremely comfortable. Our driver Harish was extremely friendly and accomodating and I recommend driving with him. On reaching Agra, our tour guide Benny showed us around the Taj Mahal and Agra Fort. His knowledge of the attractions was impressive and he had an answer to all our questions. A very pleasant experience overall!!!

Our driver Harish has driven us for several days inside Delhi and on an amazing day trip to Jaipur - excellent driver, always precise appointments and useful advice on the way. Reasonably priced, too. Highly recommended!

Review: We hired this service to show us around the sights of Delhi and Jaipur. We managed to see everything really wanted to and our driver Harrish was excellent! A great service, fair price and would highly recommend.

Review: We are hired car kumar taxi very much excellent service And very good package all tour driver very good very much good person always smell and good knowledge all monument and all time car use fastege  no any problem I recommend all time favorite kumar tourist taxi service and Driver Harish bhati  thanks

Name: Daniels
Title: Great Experience
Review: Kumar Tourist Taxi Service is prompt in service. Cars are very well maintained and in top condition. They are very punctual and great for business travel. I traveled in their vehicle for 3 days. I am very satisfied with the services given by their driver Mr. Kaamal Ahmed. Highly Recommended.

Name: Manjad A
Title: Rajsthan tour
Review: Very nice rajsthan tour  .very good injoy Kumar company. This company is very important excellent service all time. Everything is fine and all time good service.

Name: jboyhoya20
Title: EXCELLENT driver for our first trip to Delhi and to Agra
Review: There were 6 us from the east coast of the US.  Grandparents and 2 preteens and parents.  Our driver was Mr.Tirlok Singh for 2 days.  He was great.  Safe, knowledgeable.  He knew the local roads and the tourist sites.  He knew the areas to avoid and kept us safe.  He pointed out known and unknown parts of Delhi.  He was always helpful and knew where to go.  Even when we were shopping, he pointed us in the right directions.  He drove all around New Delhi and Old Delhi.  And the following day took us to AGRA to see the Taj Mahal and back.  The Kumar Brothers also added a guide in AGRA who escorted all the way in and gave us some great information about the site.  The guide in AGRA gave us the does and don't and took us through the gates without a wait.  Then the 3 hour ride back to Delhi, Mr Singh pointed out all the local sites and had some interesting information about the areas.  Mr. Singh was the best of the drivers of the Kumar tourist Taxi service.  The company were very responsive on WHATS APP.  Picked us up and dropped us off at the Airport.  When we return to Delhi I would use them again and specifically ask for Mr. Singh.

Name: Dip Bhatt
Title: Rajasthan Golden tour
Review: We are from Manchester, UK. We were walking in Connaught palace and found a goverment approved travel agency named Kumar Taxi services. After discussing, we made a short 8 day tour from Delhi -> Vrindivan -> Mathura -> Agra -> Jaipur -> Pushkar -> Jodhpur -> Jaisalmer -> Bikaner -> Delhi return.We really enjoyed this trip with so many activities all included in this tour. The driver of this car was named Harish Bhati and was amazing with the family.Next time we come to India, we will 100% be in contact with Kumar taxi services, not only was Harish a driver, however another family driver. Good management, knew how to save time and was very humorous. For anyone wanting to travel, be careful with Harish on the way to Jodhpur, it'll be a fun, bumpy ride🤣On a serious note, I will 100% be in contact with Kumar Taxi Services and if possible, to arrange with Harishji as our main driver.

Name: Jaginder Kapoor
Title: Excellent Car Rental Service in New Delhi India
Review: Kumar Tourist Taxi Service, conveniently located in the center of the city, in Cannaught Place, Delhi was a great plus.  I booked my car, A Crista SUV from the United States.  Contacted the owner, Mr. Sandeep via Whatsapp. He was courteous and business like, quoted his prices, for pick up from the airport, day trips in Delhi as well as day trip to Agra.It was a pleasure working with him.His drivers, Messrs Ram and Tirlok were wonderful and extremely knowledgeable.Keep up the good work, and thank you.

Name: Stuti C
Title: Business Meeting
Review: I travel frequently due to my business meetings and I always trust Kumar brothers because of their high quality cars fleet. They are highly professional and have trained drivers for great journey experience. Feel free to plan your travels with Kumar brothers for great experience!

Name: Reeta Chadha
Title: Family trip
Review: i came  to India to spend few days with family. I found out about Kumar brothers through few family friends and they recommended me to plan my travel with Kumar brothers for safer travel with family. After one conversation i booked a car with our driver Bhupinder. He helped us and made us aware about the destination and cultures. I highly recommend Kumar tourist for a happy experince for any kind of travel.

Name: Divya Sivasankaran
Title: Excellent Tourist Taxi Service
Review: We had driver, Kailash, and he was great! He made sure we were comfortable at all times and got us to all the place we wanted to go to. I highly recommend!

Name: Alix
Title: Pink city
Review: We hired car by Kumar cab .car  very need and clean  mr Kumar speech  very good english he explained very good about monuments and cityes culture of Jaipur too he has very good knowledge and experienced holder he is very kind and humble I give him 5star having coz he desired for this I highly recommend for this company Thanks Mr Kumar provided excellent service and new car and good driver

Name: winsess
Title: Excellent Service Except the Tourist Trap
Review: We hired Kumar tourist taxi for 15 days, we start our trip from Delhi to which we were accompanied by their tourist guide Sonny to some sites in Delhi, sonny brought us to store which sells very expensive saree and fabric by yards, price is almost 3x or 4x than the other store. Then we proceed in Agra where we meet their guide Ali, he showed us Agra fort and Taj Mahal. He brought us again to local stores which are fixed price and very expensive, we checked the internet the cost of jewelled wall carpet and we found out that the store is more than 5x expensive! Ali even recommend us photographer in Taj Mahal which we agreed and in the end of the trip the photographer give us price of INR 8,000 for 80 hard copy and 2 cds. We felt we were trap and we request to Kamal (our driver) that we no longer need any guide to the next destination. We went to Jaipur, we visit Neemrana Fort where we enjoy our lunch there, we roam around city palace and hawa mahal on our own. Kamal requested that we need to have a guide in the jaigarh fort and amber palace since it is too huge, we agree to hire the guide. Our tourguide in Jaipur is highly recommended, he did not  push us to visit 'tourist' store and very knowledgeable about the history of amber palace.We visit Jaisalmer, the quiant golden city of India, we fell in love with the place. Every villa/haveli's facade here were intricate and well made of sand stones. We asked Kamal to send us tourguide since we already tired and we want to maximize our day visit in this lovely city. Our tourguide showed as the impressive jaisalmer fort and its own Jain Temple, we were in awe when we saw the place. He even showed us the some beautiful haveli and brought us to silver factory where we bought few intricate peices and some ethnic handicrafts which we find price a bit affordable.In jodhpur, we managed to visit Clock tower, Umaid bhawan and Mehrangarh Fort and Museum on our own with the help of Our driver Kamal. Kamal send us to Maharani textiles where we buy a bit expensive shawls and bed linens, this store fabricate their stories being the supplier of hermes, mulberry,kenzo etc. Udaipur, our last stop, we love the cleanliness of this city. We did sidetrip in Chittogarh where Kamal himself became our instant tourguide, he has a bit knowledge on the area. We also went to Ranakpur Jain Temple. And our last day, Kamal send us our guide Uma to walk around the city palace, lake and the garden.Kumar tourist taxi is very reliable company, I hope their tourist guide will no longer bring their tourist to very expensive stores. It will only give a bad name and reputation to the company. Nevertheless, we enjoy India with Kumar Tourist Taxi.

Name: Ben Yu
Title: Great service for 15days with Mr Kamal
Review: We book Kumar Tourist Taxi from dec 26 to jan 10,2020. Our driver Mr Kamal Kumar is very good, well knowledge and very patient driver. We highly recommend this company, they are well precise, very professional driver. We travel from delhi, agra, jaipur, pushkar, jaisalmer, jodhpur and udaipur and we enjoy each city with their tourist guide.

Name: Simon A
Title: Golden Triangle
Review: Dubious to book a driver but we had a very good trip. Harish Bhati was very helpful and brought the trip together. Car was always clean and good driving throughout.

The car was very clean and comfortable and our driver was Harissh Bhati who was very professional and great company to drive us around to the Taj. We enjoyed our time very much. We would recommend this company as it was Excellent service.

Always ready before time and he knows each places where good food available.Thanks Bhupinder Singh to make our trip enjoyable, successful and safe. We will go with u in future also. Title: Visit to mathura-vrindavan from delhi
Review: Very excellent service,neat and clean car,exellent driver Mr.Harish Bhati.we travelled mathura vrindavan from delhi.

Name: Jamuna Seethapathy
Title: Two weeks North india trip
Review: We hired an Innova Crysta 7+1 from Kumar travel services. The driver Kamal Kumar picked up my family of six from Delhi airport and stayed with us for the entire two weeks. He provided excellent service. He drove us to Lucknow, Agra, Vrindavan, Jaipur and back to Delhi. Throughout the trip he arranged guides at each city for sight seeing, suggested good places to eat and places to shop for local specialities. Kamal was very knowlegeable and a very sweet natured person. Within a couple of days he became like family member. We really enjoyed our trip thanks yo Kamal for facilitating everything for us. The car provided by Kumar travels was in excellent condition or else covering so many cities by road would be tough especially with parents who are anove 70yrs. There were no hidden clauses or surprises at the time of payment. They were very clear and accurate in their billing.I fully reccommend Kumar tour taxis for your travels. Ask for driver Kamal Kumar for a really pleasant and comfortable trip.

Name: Laura Serrano
Title: Golden triangle tour
Review: We used Kumar Tourist Taxi service for our Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Jodhpur, Udaipur. It was a pleasure meeting Arvind Basin, the owner, who took extra efforts to ensure the car met the European standard, very clean and top working condition. I must add special mention of our chauffeur and guide, Harish Bhati, who was professional and pleasure to interact who followed instructions and provided tips based on his experience in this industry. A chauffeur driven car gives all the flexibility and comfort for these kind of tours where one can relax and enjoy taking away all the botheration.

Name: Prameet Mohanty
Title: Trip to Himachal Pradesh
Review: Had a great and pleasant experience, the journey was made even better due to the experienced and good driving of kamal kumar . Overall, it was a successful trip and couldn’t have gone better. We were pleased with the service, pleasant driving, clean and comfortable car etc. perfect in every way, we were even offered free water. We felt save all the time and the driver manoeuvred safely on the busy streets of kasol, Malana and many different places.Kamal kumar is clearly passionate about his business and ensuring his customers have the best possible experience. We would recommend have the best possible experience. We would recommend his transport service without hesitation and will not only be using him the next time, but will be recommending him to all our friends, associates and family. Kumar tourist is the best in delhi P.s-thank you kumar ji

Name: Murthy M
Title: Golden Tour (Delhi-Agra-Mathura-Jaipur)
Review: It was truly golden, it was awesome. Special mention on driver Harish who has been patient to drive us to places and guided us by prioritizing the sight seeing for the day. It would not have been so pleasantful without him. He spoke well in English and Hindi. He was always with us. He took complete ownership of our stay in the 3 places. he guided us smartly through how to plan our day, good food eats, guarantee places to shop, how to deal with nagging guides at monuments. we have visited around 16 monuments in Delhi, 2 places in mathura, 2 places in Agra, jaipur and places on our way to jaipur aswell. There were instances where he suggested places which were otherwise not in our list, and they turn out to be good. He also asked us to call him in case of need anytime in an unknown city. It was such a relief!! It is particularly important because cab and driver issues can be small but they can ruin the upliftment of your vacation.Our family would totally recommend Harish ji with Kumar Services to anyone across the world. He would make it a hassle-free trip for us.

Our driver mr Harish bhati good person for tourists  very good coprete every man .thanks mr manager varun gupta give tha nice car and excellent service  thanks.

Review: We booked Inova from Delhi -Agra-Jaipur for 8 days trip along with our mother,kumar taxi service they give us very good service. They provide us wheel chair and our driver  Mr.Bupindar singh was very friendly and through out our toor he was like our family member.we recommend kumar taxi service.

Name: Hasmukh G
Title: Very Reliable Taxi Services
Review: Kumar Tourist Taxi Services in New Delhi is the one whose services we engaged several times when we were in New Delhi during the last week of August 2019 and the first 3 weeks of September 2019.  During that time, we engaged their services for six days to visit some places in Nainital and Haldwani district in Uttarakhand.  We used their services for visiting Vrindavan also.  Mr. Arvind Kumar, the owner, runs a very efficient and very reliable taxi service.  He himself answers phone calls at all hours of the day.  He is very courteous and responsive.  He understands customer's needs.  His drivers are good and they treat customers well.  They always arrive on time.  Above all, Kumar Taxi Services rates for all sizes of taxis are very competitive.  Next time we are in New Delhi, we will definitely call upon Mr. Arvind Kumar.Hasmukh Gandhi, Tampa, Florida

Friendly driver Harish bhati arrived promptly at 530 am and guided us all the way to Agra and mathura. Very pleasant person with excellent driving skills , safe ,and excellent service ! Would recommend this travel without any hesitation.

Title: Good service from Kumar taxi service
Review: We had hired taxi  (Crysta) from Kumar tour operators for 4 days . Service they had provided is really good from Airport pick from 1st day up to drop on 4th day .Deepak was my driver ,He is very helpful and punctual .He drove us to almost all part of delhi and Agra within these 4 days .Charges were very reasonable. I really recommend his service .

Name: Saurabh
Title: Great experience with Mr. Harish Bhati
Review: We had hired a Innova Crysta car from Kumar Tourist Taxi service for first time as our usual taxi supplier was not available . We were a little apprehensive as we had booked for the first time from Kumar for travel to Agra with my Bangladesh suppliers. But the moment we met our driver Mr. Harish Bhati , all our fears were gone. He was a thorough gentleman who really knew how to appease his client. Immaculately dressed , neat and clean and very sober and well mannered . His driving skills were very fine and we had a smooth ride to and back from Agra. He knew the routes well and my clients were also very appreciative of him

Name: Sunny Q
Title: Buland Darwaja
Review: we hire three time used car from Delhi kumar cab .very mantaind clean good condition car very excellent service .and driver very helpful polit good person good driving every time driver mr gujjar .car very comforteble  .we are like this company provided new car and good driver and excellent service .we are recominded kumar cab company  .Thanks mr kumar .and next time sure use your company and gujjar driver . Thanks

Name: jatin r
Title: Rishikesh
Review: Excellent response from the company and Shri Harish Bhati's driving is superb and kind nature. A good human.

Name: Nicola
Title: Taxi Transfer Delhi Shimla Manali
Review: We went on two taxi transfer rides with Kumar Taxi service: one from Delhi to Shimla and one from Manali to Delhi. Since we had two bicycles with us and didn't want to go on a bus ride with them we decided for taxi and it was well worth it.All organisation with Kumar was perfect: prompt replies, absolutely reliable, reasonable price, really clean and well maintained cars.Both drives were very pleasant and our drivers Qayum and Deepak we can recommend very much, they were really nice and very good at navigating through indian traffic.And also beyond the pure driving skills they were very kind.Especially we want to highlight that Qayum supported us so much in sorting out hotel hassles in Shimla by doing phone calls for us in order to organise a second hotel after the one we originally booked was not acceptable and was so patient to drive us to first and then on to second hotel.And Deepak gave us so much information about indian country and culture, that was very interesting and valuable. And he was driving extremly smoothly. So we had a really rewarding and relaxing tour with him.

Name: Jay P
Title: Harish Bhati - Marvellous Driver
Review: I'm writing this review, to magnify the great service that Harish provided, very friendly and knowledgeable.We spent 4 days with Harish, day one in Delhi, day two from Delhi to Agra, day three from Agra to Jaipur, day four from Jaipur back to Delhi.He always put our safety first, warned us of area and people to avoid, for our own personal safety.Took us to great reasonable priced restaurants.He also provided a cooler for refreshments on the journey.If you ever find yourself in Delhi and need a driver, I highly recommend Harish Bhati

Name: Ayush Kumar B
Title: Trip to Agra
Review: We started our tour on 15 August and till 19 August over driver name is Kera Toyota crysta and we were visited in Agra what p laces for example Taj Mahal Fatehpur Sikri and extra what an amazing trip  pickup on time and departure also and time and professional driver I will requirement this Traveller company to my friends and family thank you for such great trip Kumar tourist taxi service thank you so much

Name: Carine
Title: Superb Drive from Dehli to Agra with Harish Bhati
Review: Our driver was very professional and respectful, he picked us up from our hotel in delhi and drove us to Agra to see the Taj Mahal. Harish Bhati is an excellent driver and gave us good advice and told us about the countryside as we were driving. Will use this company again next time we go to delhi.

Name: Audrey H
Title: Harish Bhati, an amazing driver 100% would recommend.
Review: Harish was our driver for our trip to the Taj Mahal from Delhi. He is very professional. He drove well in a clean and comfortable car. He taught us how to avoid tourist traps and brought us to the right places for souvenir and food that are reasonably priced.

Name: Thad Shattuck
Title: Day trip from Delhi to Agra
Review: Very nice car, clean and modern. Seatbelts that actually work. Our driver, Harish Bhati was very professional, and super helpful. Gave us some good tips on what to expect getting our ticket, and what to look our for about tourist traps. He took us to a fixed price government souvenir shop, save price for locals and tourists, very nice presents at reasonable prices. He waited for us while we went to Taj Mahal, and was there to pick us up when we got out. We got rained on, and he drove us around to take some pictures from the car until it stopped. 10/10 service and quality, will definitely use next time I come to Delhi.

Name: Partho Bose
Title: Partho Bose
Review: We booked acar for Vrindavan, Mathura and Agra. The car as promised was Etios. Seats and inside the car was clean. Driver Mr. Balbir Singh was cool, very well behaved, polite, cooperative in nature and his driving was safe. We felt a very comfortable journey and enjoyed a lot. I definitely recommend Kumar Tourist Taxi Services to our near dear friends for future tours.

Name: BKS
Title: Splendid Tour
Review: We selected Kumar tourist taxi service in Delhi based on reviews in tripadvisor. We were assigned Mr. Harish Bhati, a seasoned chauffeur. His excellent,safe driving skills, timeliness, professional and gentle behaviour enhanced our travel experience appreciably. He presented a composed attitude while negotiating frustrating traffic and still letting the kids to have their say throughout the travel.Thanks Harish and Kumar travels for this memorable experience.

Name: Harish
Title: The Great Reality
Review: We are from Greater Noida Always . Every time use car this company. Good conditions cars well Maintained and clean. Driver was professional and Helpful  . I Recommend this company.  Thanks

Name: Mario M
Title: Nice trip and experience
Review: Trip Dehli to Agra.Good car, the driver Mr.Trilok on time, excelent driver skils, happy to help with all.Price absolutly ok.

Name: Arun
Title: Memorable Experience
Review: Hired a vehicle with driver, Mr Khayyum. The entire trip was excellent. Mr Khayyum was very knowledgable about all the 3 cities (Delhi, Jaipur and Agra) in the Golden Triangle. He was also very professional and took us to appropriate places to eat as per our choice and taste. Nothing was too much trouble for him and he was quite happy to modify the planned trip according to our wishes. He interacted well with everyone in our family including the kids. He never asked us for anything over and above the package price. He is a definite asset for Kumar Travels and the entire experience of using Kumar travels for booking and after care was excellent. Best travel agency used so far. Arun(UK)

Name: satyajit mahanty
Title: Good and great service
Review: Everytime I always use there services well maintained vehicles with excellent cooperative drivers, highly recommended

Name: girish Gupta
Title: Mussorie tour
Review: Best trip to mussorie queen of hills went to company bagh and kempty fall mall road enjoyed lots sight seen are quite good weather is best for enjoying unforgettable new car in a very good condition our driver bhai Harish Bhati job is very nice person and verycooperative we are happy from his service this is second time journey with him excellent driving and services

Name: Anil Chadha
Title: Title
Review: Kumar tourist taxi service was recommended to us by our son and daughter in law. We are so glad we followed their advice and booked a 12 night tour of Delhi, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Sardargarh, Jaipur, Rathanbore National Park and Agra. We loved every minute of our trip. So well organised and hotels were the best! Great email communication with the company when planning the trip.Our son and daughter in law also recommended inderjeet as a driver and we were lucky that he was available for most of our trip. Brilliant driver!! Tour consisted of a lot of hours on the road so you need to know you have a good driver you can count on. inderjeet was always there with fresh bottled water in the morning and a smile, getting us to our next location safely and on time. We also had drivers balbir and harish for the first day and a half in Delhi and they were also very good drivers and helpful.This is a very professional organisation, would not hesitate to recommend for any English speaking tourist  To Inderjeet and Kumar Tourist Taxi Service thank you the experience was truly fantastic!

Next day urly morning started tour and first go to Taj Mahal very nice beautiful building top super top monument. Our driver Mr Banni very good driver good person good behaviour we are happy his experience with excitement service. Thanks Mr Kumar and driver banni provided new car and excellent service and next time sure use Kumar car. Thanks

Name: Seema
Title: Visit to Himalaya's Mountain
Review: I Seema with my family decided to visit some places in Himalaya's Mountains.So we started searching for some reliable and trustable transport company on internet and through trip advisor and website, I choose kumar tourist taxi service. We all enjoyed the trip and car and ride was very comforting. We went to mountain roads in Manali and Dharamshala area.We also went to Amritsar with the driver of the company Qayum and he drives very safely and also look after our kids very well.Would really thanks kumar tourist taxi service for an amazing experience of moutains and also would like to recommend to our family relatives and friends for highly star rated service.

Title: DELHI to Varanasi  tour

The service provide by kumar tourist taxi service is marvellous... New Crysta....along with well experience driver makes our tour a memboral one... Thanks Kumar tourist taxi service..... Name: Sapna arora
Title: Amazing visit to jaipur
Review: It was an awesome trip managed my kumar tourists..hastlefree.. Convenient...value for money. I would love to book them again for any visits. Thanks

Name: Ankit
Title: Dependable and helpful service
Review: I hired kumar tourist taxi service for a 6 days tour of the Golden triangle and Agra. My driver trilok was great! He was always on time spoke english well, and was very helpful throughout my trip. Trilok helped me prioritize my itinerary always had chilled water bottles ready whenever I returned from a site and he even helped me bargain for souvenirs with shopkeepers! The car was very clean the AC was a lifesaver and the car wifi was also a nice perk.the communication with the service was handled by mr. Kumar and it was also very straightforward. Highly recommended this comapny and trilok.

Name: Dasss.. @@@
Title: Fabulous service
Review: We used kumar tourist taxi service from delhi to agra and jaipur over several days.great value for money safe and reliable service in a well kept air conditioned car and a fabulous driver mr bhupinder.than you mr kumar thoroughly enjoyed your company and the service you provide nothing was too much trouble an absolutely gem.

Name: Aakku
Title: Best taxi company
Review: Kumar tourist taxi exceeded all of our expectation.they responded promptly to all our email.they picked us up from the air port sharply by the time we arrived in new delhi.the driver mr.harish man was an amazing driver and guide the thoughtout our multi day trip to india.he paid attention to every detail not only having a clean car every day,but also driving carefully and providing great tips all long the trip.we are thankfully for harish bhati for taking grate care of us.so my journey was amazing and thankyou for kumar sir he is great person.

Name: Amazingsnowjoy
Title: Several trips to Uttrakhand. No-1 Taxi services in Delhi
Review: Truly professional attitude with equal concern for customer's comfort, yet flexibility in the approach.
